text: Paweł Wojtala (27 October 1972) is a Polish former footballer who played as a defender. He spent most of his career in his native Poland and in Germany. He won 12 caps with the Poland national team. Whilst at Werder Bremen he helped them win the 1998–99 DFB-Pokal, playing as a substitute in the final against Bayern Munich as Bremen won on penalties. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Association football defenders Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland international footballers Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Hamburger SV players Category:SV Werder Bremen players Category:Legia Warsaw players Category:Rot-Weiß Oberhausen players Category:Rot Weiss Ahlen players Category:Karlsruher SC players Category:Warta Poznań players Category:Hallescher FC players Category:Wolfsberger AC players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Bundesliga players Category:2. title: Paweł Wojtala
